page.title: 12A Day in My Life
page.content: I usually wake up about 7.30am.I walk downstairs put my glasses on.I go into the kitchen and make my breakfast. After that I get dressed and put my shoes on.I sit down and watch TV AM at about 8.30.When I walk down to school I sometimes walk down with Shaun my friend.When I get to the shop fronts I go in GT Newsagents.I play out for about 15 minutes.We go into school at 9.00am and work until 10.30am when we have playtime.We come in at 10.45am and work until noon We have our dinner and a lunch break up to 1.00pm.We work until 2.15pm then have a playtime until 2.30pm.We finish school at 3.30. I walk home,it takes 10 minutes,and have my tea.Then I go out to play.We usually play at football or cricket or make up our own game.I go in and go to bed at about 9.00pm.
